content.rendered:
DIMENSIONS:

The sum of the three dimensions (Height + Length + Width) of a piece of luggage must not exceed 158 cm.

WEIGHT:

For handling purposes, a baggage must not exceed 32 Kg. In any case, it must be divided into several parts not exceeding 32 Kilos each or oriented towards the FRET Air Algérie.

For more details visit : http://www.air algerie.com/Baggage/Baggage-Information

Air Algerie Excess Baggage

Air Algerie Hand | Cabin Baggage
